dc.title: Natural Resource Damage Assessment and Restoration Program
dc.description: The mission of the U.S. Department of the Interior's Natural Resource Damage Assessment and Restoration Program is to restore natural resources injured as the result of oil spills or hazardous substance releases into the environment.
